# VisualShaderNodeTransformCompose

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Composes a [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) from four [Vector3](class_vector3.md)\ s within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Creates a 4Ã—4 transform matrix using four vectors of type ``vec3``. Each vector is one row in the matrix and the last column is a ``vec4(0, 0, 0, 1)``.
